org.cripac.isee.vpe.ctrl

Class ConfigFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cripac.isee.vpe.ctrl.CfgFileManager

  • public class ConfigFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ConfigFileManager manages configuration files other than several preset ones to be uploaded to Spark. Note that it is only usable before the system is submitted to YARN.

    Created by ken.yu on 16-10-8.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get a concatenated string list of paths of temporary configuration files.
      static java.util.List<FileDescriptor> getConfigFileList(java.lang.String... path)
      Get a list of all the configuration files registered under the path.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigFileList

        public static java.util.List<FileDescriptor> getConfigFileList(@Nonnull
                                                               java.lang.String... path)
        Get a list of all the configuration files registered under the path.
        Parameters:
        path - A length-variable array of names of hierarchies.
        Returns:
        A list of descriptors of all the configuration files.

      • getConcatConfigFilePathList

        public static java.lang.String getConcatConfigFilePathList(@Nonnull
                                                           java.lang.String connector,
                                                           @Nonnull
                                                           java.lang.String... path)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Get a concatenated string list of paths of temporary configuration files. The temporary configuration files are copied from those in this project, and stored in the temporary directory. On the first call of this method, the ConfigManager will automatically prepare the temporary files. The files are automatically deleted on the exit of JVM.
        Returns:
        A string of concatenated paths.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On error preparing temporary configuration files.
